Reviews.Title: Unbelievable Bundle and GREAT seller!
Reviews.Author: DizzyBone
Reviews.Content: Bundle arrived fast and had all the items as listed!  Camera is amazing and the bundle allows you to take full advantage right out of the box!

ProductInfo.Features:
20.3MP APS-C CMOS Sensor
DRIMe IV Image Processor
3.31" AMOLED Tilt Touch Screen Display
Full HD 1080p 60 fps Video Capture
Dual Channel Wi-Fi via SMART CAMERA App
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung NX300 Digital Camera with 18-55mm Lens - Brown + 32GB SDHC Class 10 Memory Card + 58mm 3 Piece Filter Kit + 2x Telephoto Lens + Wide Angle Lens + Carrying Case + Table Top Tripod, Lens Cleaning Kit, LCD Protector + USB SDHC Reader
